en: The actual author is Johann Valentin Andreae , whose name did n’t appear on the book originally , thus ensuring the confusion .
baseline: 原作者是约翰·瓦伦丁·安德烈亚(Johann Valentin Andreae),其名字最初没有出现在书上,从而确保了混乱。

en: It was just before Easter Sunday , 1 and I was sitting at my table .
baseline: 正值复活节前夕,我正坐在桌旁。

en: In a recently - accepted Evolution paper Bos and colleagues describe ants appearing to self - medicate .
baseline: 在最近接受的进化论文中,博斯和同事描述的蚂蚁似乎自给药.

en: Infected ants chose food laced with toxic hydrogen peroxide , whereas healthy ants avoided it .
baseline: 感染的蚂蚁选择用有毒氢过氧化物的食品,而健康的蚂蚁则避免了。
zh: 感染的蚂蚁选择以毒性氢氧化物为原料的食品,而健康的蚂蚁则避免了.

en: In the wild , Formica fusca can encounter similar chemicals in aphids and dead ants .

en: We collected wild colonies of Formica fusca by searching through old tree - trunks in old logging sites in southern Finland .
baseline: 我们通过在芬兰南部的旧伐木地点搜寻古树干,搜集了福尔米卡森林的野生种群。
